channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Remote Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Remote Service

item.title: CVE-2022-44608|2024-08-03T13:54:03.975Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in Cybozu Remote Service 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to consume huge storage space, which may result in a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-20799|2024-08-03T17:53:22.605Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20796|2024-08-03T17:53:22.583Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 allows a remote authenticated attacker to upload an arbitrary file via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20807|2024-08-03T17:53:22.642Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.0.0 to 3.1.9 allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-26838|2024-08-03T05:11:44.596Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Importing Mobile Device Data of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-20795|2024-08-03T17:53:23.059Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators and unintended operations may be performed via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20806|2024-08-03T17:53:22.509Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in Cybozu Remote Service 3.0.0 to 3.1.9 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20802|2024-08-03T17:53:22.625Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: HTTP header injection vulnerability in Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote attacker to alter the information stored in the product.

item.title: CVE-2021-20803|2024-08-03T17:53:22.318Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Operation restriction bypass in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the data of the management screen.

item.title: CVE-2021-20804|2024-08-03T17:53:22.817Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20800|2024-08-03T17:53:22.451Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20805|2024-08-03T17:53:22.671Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.7 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20798|2024-08-03T17:53:22.814Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-20797|2024-08-03T17:53:23.130Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cross-site script inclusion vulnerability in the management screen of Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain the information stored in the product. This issue occurs only when using Mozilla Firefox.

item.title: CVE-2021-20801|2024-08-03T17:53:22.673Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20remote%20service
item.description: Cybozu Remote Service 3.1.8 to 3.1.9 allows a remote authenticated attacker to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks and obtain the information stored in the product via unspecified vectors. This issue occurs only when using Mozilla Firefox.
